title: Ranked
body: So i want to play ranked flex since i got gold 5 in normal ranked at the end of the season would they take the Gold 5 or the ranked flex one where i get silver or lower, at the end of the season

replies.body: I don't have the article but I'm pretty sure in their discussion of how two ranked queues would work this year, Riot stated that your highest rank among the queues would be the one you are rewarded for. They also mentioned that they would have a special reward for players who get gold in both solo/duo and flex queue. This I remember for sure.

We don't have any news just yet for end of season rewards, so I couldn't tell you for sure.  I imagine each queue type may have their own set of rewards, but I may be off on that.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for now, and stand by for more announcements as we draw closer to the end of the season!
